name: Red Sky Aviation
about: Red Sky Aviation, located at 333 W Jack London Blvd, Hangar 135 in Livermore, CA, offers comprehensive flight training programs with a strong emphasis on safety and flying skills. Our expert instructors, with tens of thousands of hours of flight experience, provide personalized instruction for Private Pilot, Recreational Pilot, Instrument Rating, and aerobatic training. We also offer tailwheel transition, currency training, and biennial flight reviews. Our training aircraft are meticulously maintained, and we ensure a safe and supportive learning environment. At Red Sky Aviation, we focus on helping students achieve their aviation goals without the pressures of mass-producing pilots for airlines, making us a trusted choice in the SF Bay Area.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
